bibl.title: Bacchylides. A Selection. (Cambridge Greek and Latin Classics.)
bibl.seg: MAEHLER Herwig (Edited by), Bacchylides. A Selection. (Cambridge Greek and Latin Classics.)
Cambridge, Cambridge University Press, 2004, 8°, xii-279 pp. ISBN 0-521-59036-1 (hbk) / 0-521-59977-6 (pbk). £47.50 (hbk) / £17.99 (pbk).

C.R. par Douglas E. Gerber, Exemplaria Classica 10 (2006) pp. 290-291 [concerne aussi: Herwig MAEHLER, Bacchylides. Carmina cum fragmentis. Editio undecima (Monachii - Lipsiae, 2003)]. - Enrico Medda, JHS 125 (2005) pp. 160-161.
